verbs.description: j balvin el david aguilar jorge drexler kany garcía halsey mon laferte natalia lafourcade victor manuelle banda los recoditos and sebastián yatra to [V: perform] [ARGM-LOC: at the 19th annual latin grammy awards ® miami- business wire -oct 29 2018-the latin recording academy] ® today announced the first round of artists scheduled to perform at the 19th annual latin grammy awards ® which includes current nominees j balvin el david aguilar jorge drexler kany garcía mon laferte natalia lafourcade victor manuelle banda los recoditos and sebastián yatra as well as a guest performance by singer - songwriter halsey previously announced performers via social media include ángela aguilar pablo alborán karol g and carlos vives plus the 2018 latin recording academy person of the year ™ maná banda los recoditos natalia lafourcade latin grammy award mon laferte j balvin halsey víctor manuelle david v aguilar el david aguilar grammy latin grammy awards ® latin grammy awards grammy award the latin recording academy sebastián yatra kany garcía jorge drexler latin recording academy person victor manuelle
